sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Samba package contains make_smbcodepage, make_unicodemap, mount.smbfs, net, nmbd, nmblookup, rpcclient, smbcacls, smbclient, smbcontrol, smbd, smbpasswd, smbspool, smbstatus, swat, testparm, testprns, wbinfo and winbindd.

sect3.title: make_smbcodepage
sect3.para: make_smbcodepage converts text descriptions of code pages to binary code page files and vice versa.

sect3.title: make_unicodemap
sect3.para: make_unicodemap converts text Unicode map files to binary, for use in mapping characters to 16 bit Unicode.

sect3.title: mount.smbfs
sect3.para: mount.smbfs provides /bin/mount with a way to mount remote Windows (or Samba) fileshares.

sect3.title: net
sect3.para: net is a tool for administration of Samba and remote CIFS servers, similar to the net utility for DOS/Windows.

sect3.title: nmbd
sect3.para: nmbd is the Samba NetBIOS name server.

sect3.title: nmblookup
sect3.para: nmblookup is used to query NetBIOS names and map them to IP addresses.

sect3.title: rpcclient
sect3.para: rpcclient is used to execute MS-RPC client side functions.

sect3.title: smbcacls
sect3.para: smbcacls is used to manipulate NT access control lists.

sect3.title: smbclient
sect3.para: smbclient is a SMB/CIFS access utility, similar to FTP.

sect3.title: smbcontrol
sect3.para: smbcontrol is used to control running smbd, nmbd and winbindd daemons.

sect3.title: smbd
sect3.para: smbd is the main Samba daemon.

sect3.title: smbpasswd
sect3.para: smbpasswd changes a user's Samba password.

sect3.title: smbspool
sect3.para: smbspool sends a print job to an SMB printer.

sect3.title: swat
sect3.para: swat is the Samba Web Administration Tool.

sect3.title: testparm
sect3.para: testparm checks an smb.conf file for proper syntax.

sect3.title: wbinfo
sect3.para: wbinfo queries a running winbindd daemon.

sect3.title: winbindd
sect3.para: winbindd resolves names from NT servers.
